nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.tasks

Interface TaskRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HazelcastTaskRunner, TaskRunnerImpl

    public interface TaskRunner
    Runs system tasks
    Author:
    luis

      Handles the database initialization
      void runInitializations(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> beanNames)
